item.title: ARC Raiders update 1.1.0 adds fixes and new map conditions
item.content:encoded:
ARC Raiders is the game of choice for a lot of people right now, with players scouring the surface of the planet for supplies while dealing with ARC’s machines and the actions of other players. Like any game, not everything is perfect at launch, so today ARC Raiders update 1.1.0 has been released to address some issues like being able to push players through walls and Augment skills not always working. The full patch list is below.

ARC Raiders update 1.1.0 patch notes

  • Fixed the issue where the Integrated Shield Recharger was only recharging when equipped.
  • Fixed an issue where Augment skills sometimes did not work.
  • Fixed exploit using deployables pushing players through walls.
  • Added a charge progress for Integrated Shield repair.
  • Fixed an issue where Health Regen skills wouldn’t work if they were triggered while DBNO.
  • Fixed the bug where the Well-Travelled achievement wouldn’t register.
  • Barricades can no longer be placed near zipline exit points.
  • Added the Punch Hands emote (preorder bonus) in game.
  • Changed the schedule so new Map Conditions become available Saturday.
    • Hidden Bunker
    • Night Raid – Blue Gate
    • Electromagnetic Storm

Can ARC Raiders be the extraction shooter for everyone?

In our ARC Raiders article, Stefan pondered whether the game could be for everyone, and said, “ARC Raiders has the potential to quickly become the biggest and best example of the extraction shooter out there. The distinct tone and feel of the world that Embark Studio has created, the feel of the action, the layered progression and systems to try and make failure not feel so final, all builds to what could be this genre’s new gold standard.”

Source: Steam
